content:
/>
III.ii.3.2.f
.
Uploading VA Forms 21-4142 and 21-4142a via QuickSubmit
There are instances in which the PMR requests will not be directly received through the CMP.  In these instances, the ROs will be responsible for uploading
both
forms via QuickSubmit for processing by the PMR contractor.
QuickSubmit is a secure online website that will allow ROs to upload
VA Forms 21-4142
and
21-4142a
into the CMP so VBAAP can begin processing the requests.
Important
:  VBAAP requires receipt of both the valid
VA Form 41-4142
and
21-4142a
to begin processing PMR requests.  Claims processors must ensure that both documents are uploaded together when using QuickSubmit.
Reference
:  For more information on how to gain access to QuickSubmit, see
PMR Resource Documents
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 3 - Requesting Evidence From Private Health Providers (PHPs)
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section None
